title: Smart Vehicle Information System (QR)
short: Flask app that generates QR codes for vehicle records and shows details.
description: A Python-Flask web app where users add vehicle details and the app generates a QR. Scanning shows vehicle info, efficiency, and status. Useful for verification and resale.

title: Vehicle Efficiency Calculator
short: Tool to compute efficiency from kms, fuel, and produce recommendation.
description: Calculates fuel efficiency and shows tips for improvement. Includes CSV export and downloadable report.
